name: Piconoid
description:
CONTROLS:

Left/Right to move the bat.

Up to send the ball.

This is a simple study project made following the tutorial from TeamworkCast:

https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYND9uft5u_1YCkmXiMrPU7tiBG3hIKAZ

I've made a few adjustments for the code and gameplay, and added a level generation, but it's still just a simple arcanoid. It was my first time working with the mighty great Pico8 and now I'm in love with this tiny beauty.
